p:
GSE30784 and GSE37991 were used to validate the above-mentioned expression results of hub genes. According to the results from TCGA-HNSC data set, compared to normal tissues, CCR4 exhibited a similar expression level in the tumor tissues ( P>0.05) (
Figures 6A, D ). The expression of CCR8 was significantly increased in tumor tissues ( P<0.001) (
Figures 6B, E ), while the expression of P2RY14 was significantly decreased ( P<0.001) (
Figures 6C, F ).
